title: YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet, Wide Shade 4/9-13 for TIG MIG ARC Weld Hood Helmet
descriptions:
Product Name: YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet

This versatile welding helmet is perfect for a variety of welding processes, including TIG, MIG, and MMA. With a viewing size of 3.64 inches in width and 1.67 inches in height, you'll have a clear and unobstructed view of your work area.

Equipped with two sensors and a lightning-fast switch speed of 1/30000 second, this helmet ensures quick and reliable reaction to changing light conditions. The optical clarity is rated at 1/1/1/1, providing you with the clearest visuals possible.

The helmet is compatible with both Cheater Lens and Magnifying Lens, allowing you to customize your view to your specific needs. The battery life is increased, ensuring long-lasting use without the need for frequent replacements.

The helmet is designed with superior comfort in mind, featuring a pivot style headgear that allows for a comfortable and secure fit. The shade range of this helmet is between 4 and 13, providing optimal protection for your eyes.

Whether you're a professional welder or a DIY enthusiast, the YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet is a reliable and high-quality choice for your welding needs.
